title: Weaviate + Haystack: Harry Potter Q&A Tutorial
description: See how easy it is to use Haystack on top of a Weaviate Document Store for a Q&A task!

title: CIO Insight on Vector Search
description: CIO Insight on the Business Application of Vector Search.

title: Weaviate + Jina AI for Image Search presented by Laura Ham
description: Use Weaviate with Jina AI's DocArray. Learn to easily set it up yourself and play around with image search!

title: "Database technology evolves to combine machine learning and data storage"
description: Article about vector search and Weaviate in VentureBeat

title: "Weaviate vector database opens up new ways to query your data"
description: Check out this Techcrunch article that features SeMI's Series-A investment

title: "SeMI Technologies' $16M Series A Round Highlights a New Wave of AI-first Database Tech"
description: Press release of SeMI's Series-A investment

title: Weaviate in Techcrunch
description: Check out this Techcrunch article that features Weaviate and in the section: How to get coverage for your company. And, vector search.

title: Wikidata Tool of the Week
description: Seem like Wikidata is also a fan of Weaviate since they chose us as the tool of the week in December 2021.

title: Wikipedia Vector Search Demo
description: A great explaining video on Henry AI Labs on how semantic search through Wikipedia, topics discussed: GraphQL, Sentence-BERT, and BERT Q&A.

title: Full Wikipedia dataset
description: We imported the complete English language Wikipedia article dataset into a single Weaviate instance. It is all available so go and run the complete setup yourself!

title: BigGraph Wikidata dataset
description: In this repository on Github, you'll find a guide on how you can import the complete Wikidata PBG model into a Weaviate.

title: Weaviate @ GraphQL Berlin
description: In this recorded presentation from Bob van Luijt he will present a case study of the GraphQL interface in the Weaviate vector searching engine.

title: Knowledge Graph Search
description: This article from Charles Pierse on Medium touches briefly on Knowledge Graphs and how we have leveraged them at Keenious.

title: Weaviate in ZDNet
description: Google uses machine learning and graphs to deliver search results. Most search engines do not. Weaviate wants to change that.

title: Vector databases explained!
description: AI Coffee Break with Letitia - Modern vector databases explained. A cool explainer video on what you need to know about today's vector databases.

title: Why is Weaviate unique?
description: Article on DB engines showing the uniqueness of Weaviate, being Approximate Nearest Neighbor (ANN) database with CRUD support

title: Vector Search through Wikidata
description: Cool video from Henry AI Labs on all sorts of topics, (Wikidata, PyTorch-BigGraph, Graph Neural Networks, Knowledge Graphs.

title: Presentation by Laura Ham
description: AI-powered vector database Weaviate by Laura Ham - during a Linux Foundation event.

title: Etienne Dilocker on Weaviate
description: Vector databases are powering the next generation of search. This podcast explores HNSW, Neurosymbolic search and filtering, and more!

title: Google Cloud's Stack Chat
description: Mark Mirchandani talks to Bob van Luijt, about what a knowledge graph is and how they've built Weaviate.

title: Weaviate for Retail
description: Learn how the Weaviate vector database helps customers like Metro AG and explore one of the many use cases Weaviate is helpfull in!

title: Weaviate @ FOSDEM 2020
description: Introduction and demo by Bob van Luijt during FOSDEM 2020 about the Weaviate vector database.

title: Weaviate @ FLOSS Weekly
description: Weaviate allows you to find the data that you're looking for fast and reliable, but it also allows you to index the data based on its meaning.

title: Data Science with Weaviate
description: Weaviate is using GraphQL to provide user-friendly data interaction. Learn more in this Graph QL Asia 2021 Presentation!

title: Keras Code Search
description: This video illustrates how to upload the Keras Code Examples into the Weaviate vector database!

title: Architecture Deep Dive
description: Weaviate is a full-fledged vector database with full CRUD support. In this meetup, Etienne Dilocker explains how Weaviate works under the hood.

title: Weaviate Python Library
description: A full tutorial on the Python library of the new Machine Learning based vector database, Weaviate

title: Sub-50ms neural search
description: How to build a fast and production-ready neural search using Transformers, DistilBERT, and the vector database Weaviate

title: Effects of filtered HNSW
description: An experiment to see how both loose and restrictive filters affect vector search speed and quality.

title: Binary Passage Retrieval
description: Hurrya! Feature Binary Passage Retrievel is out. See this video from Henri AI Labs for a quick overview.

title: Weaviate and Haystack
description: Weaviate can be used as the DocumentStore, serving as the database for Haystack retrievers.

title: Open Data Science Conference
description: The Rise of the Database, interview by Sheamus McGovern with Bob van Luijt on the Open Data Science Conference.

title: The NLP Zone: Episode 6
description: Interesting talk with Natural Language Processing-Specialist Jordan Luxford and Bob van Luijt.
